item.title: Collector reviews postal ballot arrangements
item.description: <![CDATA[Gadwal: District Collector BM Santosh has directed officials to ensure that the postal ballot process for municipal election duty staff is conducted smoothly and without any errors. On Sunday, the Collector inspected the Postal Ballot Facilitation Centre set up at the Gadwal Municipal Office for employees engaged in municipal election duties to exercise their voting rights through postal ballots in their respective municipalities. During the inspection, he reviewed the number of applications rec...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Big Story, Andhra Pradesh
